title: Are bronze players gorillas in disguise?
body: i was smurfing and saw them trying to  communciate

replies.body: bronze is actually better than silver, i can carry bronzies but i cannot carry silvers.

> [{quoted}](name=vQwaKe,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0nbqOP9K,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-04-14T07:48:07.695+0000)
>
> bronze is actually better than silver, i can carry bronzies but i cannot carry silvers.
The difference between Silver 3/4/5 and bronze 1/2 is pretty darn small, at best I will agree bronze 1 > silver 5/4. 

also you can carry bronzies because the games there are some-what easier to rofl stomp

any silver 3 can get out of bronze if they play enough games imo.

> any silver 3 can get out of bronze if they play enough games imo.

Sure, if you play enough games then the likelihood of you being ranked based on your actual skill rather than your luck starts to appear.

Buuuuut, luck being luck, the amount of games you need to play can be extraordinarily high. Especially on OCE where server stability is... Well, when I can have AFK's twenty games in a row on my side thanks to connection issues, the amount of games I need to play in order to rank up gets a bit ridiculous. It's the problem of being a 5v5, you are reliant on those four on your team not to just feed horribly.

If they play defensively and you can get rolling? Sure, you should be able to carry. If they get d/c'd, die a lot, etc, then you will lose regardless of how well you do. The only exceptions to that are crazy backdoor plays and champs like Riven. If you can get a few levels up on Riven, and an item or two, then it's hard enough to shut you down that you might win it. Unless you die, then it's gg, wp, insert coin and try again.
O_O. They are onto us. Run. We will be back... as FISH!!!

Yeah I can see your point, clear as crystals.

Since you're here, writing this thread.

i troll u
